data.text: @rekaBacisseJ Yeah I will continue wearing mine. I’m worried because the school one is going to be lifted on the 14th and the school already emailed us parents that they won’t require them after that. Kids are cesspools of disease!

@Laundrylists When I grocery shopped today it was nice to see 99% of the other shoppers masked. I’m still not ready though. I’ll definitely still be wearing mine! I had Covid back in December and still can’t figure out exactly where I was exposed.

@rekaBacisseJ I went to see Hamilton the Friday before last and it blew my mind how many people in line were already out of their masks. Thankfully, they were still enforcing masks and checking vaccine cards so indoors everyone had theirs (I already had mine cus I Ubered)
@Laundrylists I went to the Landmark theater on Pico last night and had a full on panic attack when I came out of the movie and saw so many people maskless. I’m not ready for this.
@finding__jane Lmao. Yeah… schools are lifting their mask mandates on the 14th I think
@Laundrylists It’s so weird to me to see these posts from Florida…
